title: Is Bleach worth watching?
body: Getting a little tired of these 13 episode animes that barely dig into any characters or story. I enjoyed hunterxhunter and thought I might give another long show a shot. Of all the shows with a massive amount of episodes this one seemed the most interesting. I've heard the usual it has tons of filler (which really isn't a big deal for me if I like a show and its characters I don't mind episodes where there isn't really any plot going on). Other than that are there any major flaws that would make it not worth investing the time into?
